channel.title: Mtg on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Mtg on Memo Tut

item.title: Technology to hack MTG
item.description: Hello everyone. I am [@denzowill](https://twitter.com/denzowill) who is a database engineer at LAPRAS. Suddenly, what do you plan to occupy the most amount of time on your adult schedule? That’s right. It’s “MTG”. Many MTGs are included in the schedule of working people. While working at LAPRAS, I also sometimes have lunch MTG and overtime MTG after work hours. When it comes to performance tuning, it is routine to start with the biggest bottleneck.
